# AnsysDPFWorkflow-Translation-Operator

![Work in Progress](https://img.shields.io/badge/status-WIP-yellow)
![Python](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/ansys-dpf-core?logo=pypi)
![C++](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-C++-blue?logo=c%2B%2B)
[![PyAnsys](https://img.shields.io/badge/Py-Ansys-ffc107.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://docs.pyansys.com/)
[![PyAnsys](https://img.shields.io/badge/PyDPF-core-ffc107.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://dpf.docs.pyansys.com/)


AnsysDPFWorkflow-Translation-Operator is a custom operator designed to translate Ansys DPF workflows between CPython (PyDPF) and C++. This project relies the PyDPF APIs to facilitate conversion of workflows, aiming to streamline cross-language workflow compatibility.

> **Note:** This project is currently a **Work in Progress** (WIP). The functionality is not yet complete.

## Features
- Translate DPF workflows from CPython to C++.
- Translate DPF workflows from C++ to CPython.

## Usage
Currently, this project is in the early stages of development. Full instructions and examples will be added as the project evolves.
